snippet.title: SteamWorld Build Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
In SteamWorld Build, you create a mining town from the ground up and dig deep in search of ancient technology, which your citizens will need to flee their perishing planet. But know that in the depths you’ll find both treasure and mortal threats - be prepared!

SteamWorld returns to PC and Consoles in 2023. 

🕹️ Play the demo 🕹️
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134770 
GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/steamworld_build_demo
Epic Games: https://store.epicgames.com/p/steamworld-build-71ee6c

📃 Wishlist 📃
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2134770 
GOG.com: https://www.gog.com/game/steamworld_build
Epic Games: https://store.epicgames.com/p/steamworld-build-71ee6c
PlayStation Store: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10004497 

😍 Follow @SteamWorldGames  😍
Twitter: https://twitter.com/steamworldgames
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/steamworldgames/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/steamworldgames
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@steamworldgames
Discord: https://discord.gg/WXzhHwB7sw
